## `DisplayBoxPlotLabels`

Specifies whether to display labels on box plots\index{graphs!box plots}.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
DisplayBoxPlotLabels(boolean display)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `boolean` display | `true` to display the labels. |
:::
